channel.title: Need help running server
channel.description:
hey guys. I have recently downloaded a source, and i have edited the compiler (in fact i am releasing my own compiler/server helper, that i did from scratch soon!!) andi have set my environemntal variables. i open my compiler, and compile it, and it works...it says..... "Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...."
Which im guessing means it compiled properly lol. So i press a random keyand it goes back to the menu, then i type i run, to run the server, and it says..... "Starting ********scape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555"
Which doesn't change. So I open up moparscape client, and type in a random name and password, and then put localhost as the ip, and try to login, and it says "error connecting to server must be down..."etc.. and it doesnt work, and the server runner doesnt change, it still says, "Starting ********scape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555"
Does anyone know what is wrong?? Any help greatly appreciated!!!
Cheers Hori dher

item.title: Need help running server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

np, i was going thru same prob as u

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running server
item.dc:creator: @hori_dher hori dher
item.description:
@hori_dher wrote:

lol, oh yea, it was the port lol, i didnt even know it was 5555 haha, cheers heeps dude!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you have to type 127.0.0.1 as ur ip and what ever that port says (in ur case 5555) put 5555 as ur port and u should be able to get on ur server.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help running server
item.dc:creator: @hori_dher hori dher
item.description:
@hori_dher wrote:

hey guys. I have recently downloaded a source, and i have edited the compiler (in fact i am releasing my own compiler/server helper, that i did from scratch soon!!) andi have set my environemntal variables.
i open my compiler, and compile it, and it works…it says…
“Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue…”

Which im guessing means it compiled properly lol.
So i press a random keyand it goes back to the menu, then i type i run, to run the server, and it says…
“Starting ********scape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555”

Which doesn’t change.
So I open up moparscape client, and type in a random name and password, and
then put localhost as the ip, and try to login, and it says
"error connecting to server must be down…"etc… and it doesnt work, and the server runner doesnt change, it still says,
“Starting ********scape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555”

Does anyone know what is wrong??
Any help greatly appreciated!!!

Cheers
Hori dher
